'''Moment of Respite''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Surf, Turf, and Perch]] with [[Chasca]]. <!--The [[recipe]] for {{Tx}}.-->

Moment of Respite decreases [[Stamina]] depleted by gliding and sprinting for all party members by '''25%''' for 1800 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
